translations: 1. 飘动，振翅：指轻盈地飞翔或移动，如鸟类或蝴蝶。
· The butterfly fluttered around the flowers.
2. 紧张不安，慌张：指心情不安或激动。
· She fluttered nervously before her performance.
她在表演前紧张地慌张。

phrs.translation: [口语](在证券交易市场或赛马场)参加小赌

sentences.sentence: The paper fluttered to the floor.
He fluttered his hands around wildly.
